description: I am a web designer. Also, I am a React front-end developer. I have been doing web design for the last many years. I have worked in web design with HTML5, CSS3, CSS3 Animation, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, JQuery Animation, React. I am ready to convert your Html conversion ( PSD, image, pdf to Html ). I know many wonderful effects of use on websites and how to keep the website clean. Effective and clean cross-browser support has been a priority in many of the projects I've worked on.

During my internship at Kalpas Innovations Pvt. Ltd., located in Hubballi, Karnataka, India, I gained hands-on experience and in-depth knowledge in React.js, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Over the period of 29th December 2021 to 29th April 2022, I worked alongside a team of skilled developers, contributing to real-world projects and learning best practices in React.js development. During my internship, I had the opportunity to work on various tasks, such as creating interactive UI components, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and troubleshooting issues. I also gained experience in using modern development tools and technologies, such as Axios, and Material-UI, to build efficient and scalable web applications.

As a Junior Software Engineer at Nascenia, I am working on Uddogi, a VAT management platform built with Ruby on Rails and JavaScript. I focus on building new features, optimizing performance, and ensuring a smooth user experience. Always eager to learn and improve.
